metadata.title: CVE-2020-12662 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Unbound before 1.10.1 has Insufficient Control of Network Message Volume, aka an "NXNSAttack" issue. This is triggered by random subdomains in the NSDNAME in NS records.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-12662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunbound8 - 1.10.1-1
python3-unbound - 1.10.1-1
unbound - 1.10.1-1
unbound-anchor - 1.10.1-1
unbound-host - 1.10.1-1
No subscription required

advisory.discovered_by: Lior Shafir, Yehuda Afek, and Anat Bremler-Barr

criterions.comment: unbound package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.1-1').
